H0.text: A drupe is a type of what. Seed

H1.text: A drupe is a type of what. Vegetable

H2.text: A drupe is a type of what. Nut

H3.text: A drupe is a type of what. Friut

A4.text: A drupe is a type of fruit.

A5.text: Hickory nuts (Carya) and walnuts (Juglans) in the Juglandaceae family grow within an outer husk; these fruits are technically drupes or drupaceous nuts, not true botanical nuts.
